Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting Detailsobject initially did not move which led me to believe it was a star or one of the planets visible in july. then, the object began to move, emitting a streak of light. THIS WAS NOT A VAPOR TRAIL. this was light. the object was in clear view for 25 mins, much longer than an airplane would have been. i have been able to explain everything ive ever seen in the sky except this. it almost resembled an extremely slow moving and sporadic comet. very strange and unusual.
Summary: strange star like object which began to move across sky slowly and deliberately with occasional direction change
